meaning list.sentence: The restaurant turned away customers because it was full.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ravintola torjui asiakkaat, koska se oli täynnä.

meaning list.sentence: She turned away to hide her tears.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hän käänsi kasvonsa pois piilottaakseen kyyneleensä.

meaning list.sentence: He turned down the job offer because the salary was too low.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hän hylkäsi työtarjouksen, koska palkka oli liian pieni.

meaning list.sentence: Can you turn down the music? It’s too loud.
When she felt lost, she turned to her friends for support.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kun hän tunsi olevansa eksyksissä, hän kääntyi ystäviensä puoleen saadakseen tukea.

meaning list.sentence: After retiring, he turned to gardening as a hobby.
meaning list.sentence translation: Eläkkeelle jäätyään hän siirtyi puutarhanhoitoon harrastuksena.

meaning list.sentence: We used up all the paint while redecorating the room.
meaning list.sentence translation: Saimme kaikki maalaukset valmiiksi samalla kun sisustelimme huonetta uudelleen.

meaning list.sentence: We decided to wait out the storm before heading home.
meaning list.sentence translation: Päätimme odottaa myrskyn ohi ja mennä kotiin.

meaning list.sentence: She walked into the office with a big smile on her face.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hän astui toimistoon leveä hymy kasvoillaan.

meaning list.sentence: He walked into a difficult situation without realizing it.
The child wandered off while her parents weren’t looking.
meaning list.sentence translation: Poika vaelsi pois, kun hänen vanhempansa eivät katsoneet.

meaning list.sentence: It took a while, but I warmed to the new manager.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kesti jonkin aikaa, mutta lämpenin uuteen manageriin.

meaning list.sentence: I’ll wash up after dinner.
The tide washed up pieces of the shipwreck.
The constant friction wore down the material.
The lengthy negotiations wore him down.
These shoes will feel more comfortable after you wear them in.
meaning list.sentence translation: Näistä kengistä tulee mukavampia, kun käytät niitä.

meaning list.sentence: He weighed in with his opinion during the meeting.
The boxers weighed in before the match.
She weighed out the ingredients for the recipe.
After a busy day, I like to wind down with a book.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kiireisen päivän jälkeen haluan rentoutua kirjan parissa.

meaning list.sentence: The company is winding down operations in the region.
meaning list.sentence translation: Yhtiö on vähitellen lopettamassa toimintaansa alueella.

meaning list.sentence: Her speech won over the skeptical audience.
She’s working up to running a full marathon.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hän valmistautuu askel askeleelta juoksemaan täyden maratonin.

meaning list.sentence: Viewers were encouraged to write in with their opinions.
Many voters decided to write in his name during the election.
meaning list.sentence translation: Monet äänestäjät asettivat hänet ehdolle kirjoittamalla hänen nimensä vaalien aikana.

meaning list.sentence: She wrote out the entire report by hand.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hän kirjoitti koko raportin yksityiskohtaisesti käsin.

meaning list.sentence: The team zeroed in on the cause of the problem.
He zoned in on his studies before the exam.
I zoned out during the boring lecture.
The kids started acting up during the long trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lapset alkoivat käyttäytyä huonosti pitkän matkan aikana.

meaning list.sentence: My computer is acting up again.
He refused to back down during the argument.
The strong wind blew away the leaves from the yard.
Her performance blew everyone away.
He bounced back quickly after his illness.
She broke in on our conversation with urgent news.
We finally brought him around to our way of thinking.
Cold water helped bring him around after he fainted.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kylmä vesi auttoi häntä palaamaan tajuihinsa pyörtymisen jälkeen.

meaning list.sentence: Can you bring over your laptop tomorrow?
I need to brush up on my Spanish before the trip.
meaning list.sentence translation: Minun täytyy harjoitella espanjaa hieman ennen matkaa.

meaning list.sentence: She carried on with her work despite the noise.
He finally came clean about what happened that night.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lopulta hän myönsi, mitä sinä yönä tapahtui.

meaning list.sentence: The company came under heavy criticism for its policies.
meaning list.sentence translation: Yhtiö on joutunut kovan kritiikin kohteeksi politiikastaan.

meaning list.sentence: They tried to cover up the scandal, but the truth came out.
meaning list.sentence translation: He yrittivät peitellä skandaalia, mutta totuus paljastui.

meaning list.sentence: You should cover up; it’s really cold outside.
meaning list.sentence translation: Sinun täytyy peittää se; Ulkona on todella kylmä.

meaning list.sentence: The village was cut off from the rest of the world during the flood.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kylä eristettiin muusta maailmasta tulvan aikana.

meaning list.sentence: We’ll have to do without a car until it gets repaired.
meaning list.sentence translation: Joudumme pärjäämään ilman autoa, kunnes se korjataan.

meaning list.sentence: The sound of the music gradually faded away.
The troops were ordered to fall back to a safer position.
He fell for her the moment he saw her.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hän rakastui heti, kun näki hänet.

meaning list.sentence: She fell for his lies again.
She fought back when the attacker tried to grab her bag.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kun hyökkääjä yritti ottaa hänen laukkunsa, hän vastusti.

meaning list.sentence: He fought back tears during the emotional speech.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hän tukahdutti kyyneleitä tunteellisen puheen aikana.

meaning list.sentence: He fired up the engine and drove away.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hän käynnisti moottorin ja ajoi pois.

meaning list.sentence: The coach fired up the team before the game.
He worked hard to get ahead of his competitors.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hän teki kovasti töitä päästäkseen kilpailijoidensa edelle.

meaning list.sentence: His strength finally gave way under the heavy load.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kovan kuorman alla hänen voimansa lopulta loppuivat.

meaning list.sentence: You must give way to pedestrians at the crosswalk.
They went all out to make the wedding perfect.
meaning list.sentence translation: He tekivät parhaansa tehdäkseen häistä täydelliset.

meaning list.sentence: He keeps going on about his new car.
The soldiers held out for two days before surrendering.
meaning list.sentence translation: Sotilaat vastustivat kaksi päivää ennen antautumistaan.

meaning list.sentence: She held out her hand to greet him.
The team managed to hold together through difficult times.
meaning list.sentence translation: Joukkue onnistui pysymään yhdessä vaikeina aikoina.

meaning list.sentence: It’s hard to keep up with all the new technology.
meaning list.sentence translation: On vaikea pysyä kaikkien uusien teknologioiden mukana.

meaning list.sentence: The teacher laid into the student for not completing the assignment.
meaning list.sentence translation: Opettaja moitti oppilasta, koska hän ei tehnyt läksyjä.

meaning list.sentence: The rain didn’t let up all day.
He didn’t let up until the project was complete.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hän ei pitänyt taukoa ennen kuin projekti oli valmis.

meaning list.sentence: He lived off his savings for several months.
He looks down on people who don’t have a degree.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hän pitää halveksuvia ihmisiä ilman tutkintoa.

meaning list.sentence: She looked him up and down before speaking.
meaning list.sentence translation: Hän katsoi häntä ylös ja alas ennen kuin puhui.

meaning list.sentence: We passed through a small town on our way to the mountains.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kuljimme pienen kaupungin läpi matkallamme vuorille.

meaning list.sentence: He passed through the city for a conference.
The media played up the risks of the new technology.
My back has been playing up again.
She popped in to say hello on her way to work.
Despite the challenges, they pushed ahead with their plans.
meaning list.sentence translation: Vaikeuksista huolimatta he jatkoivat suunnitelmansa toteuttamista.

meaning list.sentence: Someone ran off with her bag while she wasn’t looking.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kun hän ei katsonut, joku varasti hänen laukkunsa ja juoksi karkuun.

meaning list.sentence: They set off on their trip early in the morning.
The venue was set up for the wedding reception.
We had to sit through a very boring lecture.
True friends will always stick by you.
meaning list.sentence translation: Todelliset ystävät pysyvät aina uskollisina sinulle.

meaning list.meaning: Alkaa viettää aikaa jonkun tai jonkun kanssa
meaning list.sentence: She took up with a new group of friends after moving to the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: Muutettuaan kaupunkiin hän alkoi viettää aikaa uuden ystäväryhmän kanssa.
